title: RADS error, can't connect. Have tried all fixes I've come across
body:
Hey, I've tried the following fixes with no luck:

Everything here: http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2053745

Running as admin

Reinstalling the game

Restarting computer and router

Disabling firewall

Disabling remote access

Are there any other known fixes for this? I am running windows 7 and could really use the help.

replies.body:
Are you seeing this when you double click the icon (before the patcher) or when you're trying to login (space when you enter in Username/Password)?

We were seeing some issues with a backbone provider yesterday which caused this error, but it should be resolved by now (and should have been when you made this post as well).  Let me know if you're still running into this issue!
